mapper.sql: order_no, mem_id, course_id, amount, count, trade_state, des
mapper.insert: insert into order_dtl (order_no, mem_id, course_id, amount, count, trade_state, des) values (#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tradeState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

order_no,

des,

mapper.update:
update order_dtl
mem_id = #{memId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trade_state = #{tradeState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
des = #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
